nodes.text: The Tolonda Oversector, also known as Sector 14, was the theaters of operations of the Republic 14th Sector Army during the Clone Wars. After the Declaration of a New Order, it was reorganized in an Imperial Priority Sector and placed under the rule of Grand Moff Ravik.
After the Battle of Yavin, two decades later, Grand Moff Ravik was still ruling the Tolonda Oversector and the 14th Sector Army.
